client.manager

Class ClientManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.manager.ClientManager

  • public class ClientManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Client Manager is a singleton class that handles the ModelFacade and ServerProxy for easier access. This class alse serves to store values for easy access as well, for example the user ID that the client is currently logged in as
    Author:
    thyer
